title: FCC makes it official: AI-generated voices in robocalls are illegal
description: The ruling arrived just weeks after New Hampshire voters received calls from an apparently digitally generated voice impersonating President Biden.

title: In Big Tech’s backyard, California lawmaker unveils landmark AI bill
description: California’s landmark AI proposal could inspire regulation around the country, as more than 44 U.S. states take up the swiftly evolving technology.

title: TikTok search suggestions are manufacturing influencer drama
description: Over the past year, TikTok has moved aggressively into search. Creators say it needs to do a better job of making sure its suggestions don’t trigger inaccurate information.

title: TikTok removes feature that critics used to study Israel-Gaza war videos
description: The change came after researchers used the video view counts to suggest the app favored one side over the other in the war. One group called the move “a step back for transparency.”

title: To use Google’s newest AI chatbot, it’ll cost you $20 a month
description: The search giant wants its ‘Gemini’ tool to help it compete with OpenAI’s ChatGPT bot.

title: AI professional headshots are quick and easy. But should you use one?
description: AI headshot providers give you the chance to get dozens of professional headshots with the click of a button, but they’re not perfect or real and raise bigger questions.
